body_html:
It’s excellent you did that. Could you also print id(self) in _shutdown_workers before the _remove_worker_pids calls? Sorry for asking you to do this. I can’t really reproduce on my side...

body:
It’s excellent you did that. Could you also print id(self) in
_shutdown_workers before the _remove_worker_pids calls? Sorry for asking
you to do this. I can’t really reproduce on my side...

On Thu, Mar 1, 2018 at 21:33 Jeven Zhang <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @SsnL <https://github.com/ssnl> sorry for the late response, I modified
> the dataloader source code in site-packages, which is allocated in conda
> envs folder, since I installed it with conda.
> [conda]/envs/dl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py
> [image: image]
> <https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17583521/36880698-1126a5d4-1e05-11e8-94d7-03f0dba37975.png>
